head.supplied: ¶ [...] ¶ ¶ For some time past I have been urged to undertake the preparation of a supplementary volume to the Flora Australiensis. The various botanical workers here wish me to do the work because ...

div.p: From Frederick Bailey to William Thiselton-Dyer
Letter press copy book 2, pp. 338-9, Queensland Herbarium, Brisbane.

For some time past I have been urged to undertake the preparation of a supplementary volume to the Flora Australiensis. The various botanical workers here wish me to do the work because they are sure that I should adopt the same style and classifications as used in the first 7 vols and they are afraid that if the work was done by Baron Mueller the nomenclature and arrangement would be very much different. I have complied with the wish of my friends and shall start about it at once, and hope to have it completed within two years as I can only devote odd times to the work.
